participant_1.name: Alex Johnson
participant_1.personality: Outspoken and a bit sarcastic, enjoys humor but can get frustrated easily.
participant_1.background: I'm terrified of scorpions. My favorite color is grey. I'm employed by the US Postal Service. My father drove a car for NASCAR.

participant_2.name: Fatima Noor
participant_2.personality: Cheerful and sociable, loves to engage in conversations and enjoys dancing.
participant_2.background: I was born in Somalia. I was forced to marry when I was a child. Now I live in the United States. I like to dance.

content.text: i used to bike and play football in college . that was before i got married .
